HowCanHelp: ^How can my genius be of use?
^Have you ever seen beyond the gate?
^Do you know where more keys are?
MoreKeys: ^You’ll have to ask around. I don’t get out much these days, too busy with my inventions.
BeyondGate: ^I have heard tale of the greatest invention ever made is kept there!
^I would give anything to see it!
WhatCity: ^You are in the lower sector of Hazy City, where I live with my inventions.
^Up the stairs is the central sector, with a popular Hat Shop, The Blacksmith and The Power Plant.
^And further up in the overlying sector is where The Famous Statue and The Zeppelin Landing Platform can be found.
